chemaxon.marvin.sketch.modules
Class LineSM

java.lang.Object
  chemaxon.marvin.sketch.SketchMode
      chemaxon.marvin.sketch.MObjectSM
          chemaxon.marvin.sketch.modules.LineSM
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArrowSM, EFlowSM, PolylineSM
public class LineSM
extends MObjectSM

Line drawing mode. This class is under development, use it at your own risk!

Since:
Marvin 3.5, 07/08/2004
Version:
4.0, 01/17/2004
Author:
Peter Csizmadia

isValidStartPoint

protected boolean isValidStartPoint(MPoint p)
Checks if the specified starting point is valid for this line type.

Parameters:
p - the starting point
Returns:
true if the point is valid, false the line cannot be started from here

Parameters:
p - the starting point
Returns:
true if the point is valid, false the line cannot be ended here
